mapper.insert: insert into customercenter(cno, c_title, c_group, c_content, c_regdate, c_viewcnt) values(cno.nextval, #{c_title}, #{c_group}, #{c_content}, to_date(#{c_regdate}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), 0)
mapper.select: select * from customercenter where c_group='notice' order by c_regdate
select cno, c_title, c_regdate, c_viewcnt from customercenter where c_group='faq' order by c_regdate
mapper.update: update customercenter set c_viewcnt = c_viewcnt + 1 where cno=#{cno}
